launchpad_s_plus

Class Calculate

  • java.lang.Object
    • launchpad_s_plus.Calculate

  • public class Calculate
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used:
    - to obtain the X or Y position of a pad based on its MIDI note value
    - to obtain the MIDI note value of a pad based on its X and Y positions
    - to return a random integer based on a min and max values
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion

      Returns the MIDI note value of the pad based on the given X and Y positions
      static int positionX(int value, boolean isCC)
      Returns the X position of a pad based on its MIDI note value
      static int positionY(int value, boolean isCC)
      Returns the Y position of a pad based on its MIDI note value
      static int randInt(int min, int max)
      Returns a randomized number between a min and max, included.

      • position

        public static int position(int x,
                           int y)
        Returns the MIDI note value of the pad based on the given X and Y positions
        Parameters:
        x - X position of the pad
        y - Y position of the pad
        Returns:
        MIDI note value

      • positionX

        public static int positionX(int value,
                            boolean isCC)
        Returns the X position of a pad based on its MIDI note value
        Parameters:
        value - MIDI note value
        isCC - If the MIDI message is a Control Change message, this needs to be true
        Returns:
        int X location

      • positionY

        public static int positionY(int value,
                            boolean isCC)
        Returns the Y position of a pad based on its MIDI note value
        Parameters:
        value - MIDI note value
        isCC - If the MIDI message is a Control Change message, this needs to be true
        Returns:
        int Y location

      • randInt

        public static int randInt(int min,
                          int max)
        Returns a randomized number between a min and max, included.
        Parameters:
        min - Minimum number
        max - Maximum number
        Returns:
        Random integer between both min and max inclusive
